attributes.action: Allow the British public to vote in relation to nationwide lockdowns
attributes.additional_details: The nation will not survive if the government continue to destroy livelihoods!
attributes.background: Allow the British public to vote if lockdowns are required or not, this is a democracy not a dictatorship

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
